ygData.subject: To Walt
ygData.msgSnippet: Walt said: My buffs are not that great yet at 10 as I only have center and the first level spell to use.   I do not think that holy armor and center can be
ygData.messageBody:
Walt said:

"My buffs are not that great yet at 10 as I only have center and the
first level spell to use. I do not think that holy armor and center
can be stacked."

OMG, Walt, are you being serious? Have you tried stacking Holy Armor and
Center? Haven't you been buffing yourself or others? Of course they
stack, my friend. All your buffs stack, one right on top of the other.
Eventually, you'll have a stack of four beautiful yellow shields that
will make you a power to be dealt with. Last night a cleric gave me
Bravery, Guard, Rune 1, and the level 2 Symbol. At level 19, I had 974
hp. And my AC was 473. Unfortunately, he was too high level (33) to be
in our group. Sighhh.....

Regards,

Llewellen Iowerth

-----Original Message-----
From: Walt Zimbeck [mailto:wzimbeck@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 1:06 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Why do so many clerics think they're wizards?


From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>

I can not speak for all young clerics only for my own. When I am in a
group
I will watch the health bars of all the others and break off from melee
to
heal. Most of the time when I am in a group and heal, the mob will
start in
on me though. I of course have taken off my auto-attack and changed
target.
Most of the time I have even backed off away from the critter. I take
my
role as the medic in my group very seriously. My buffs are not that
great
yet at 10 as I only have center and the first level spell to use. I do
not
think that holy armor and center can be stacked. As I have stated many
times here before though my problem is finding a group to start with.

I also will not use smite that often in melee unless I am alone since I
do
prefer to save my mana for healing and buffing. Those two buffs alone
take
me about two bars of mana. I have around a 105 or 110 wisdom and two
wisdom rings of +2. I know I need more items but they are expensive
for
sure and I, like most my age, am pretty broke.

I really do not see why the others fail to do their duty. I often play
melee classes and have clerics and druids heal me when I am resting all
the
time.

Yilari, Cleric of Tunare, Erollsi Marr
